entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-21808: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #247
  • .NET February 2023 Updates #246

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test failure System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.CancellationTokenTests.CancellationTokenSource_CancelAsync_AllCallbacksInvoked #82140
  • [SuperFileCheck] Stronger verification for directives #82139
    Future
  • Look into DBI/DAC EnumerateModules performance under windbg's ClrComposition extension #82137
    8.0.0
  • [SuperFileCheck] Consider using FileCheck's modifier syntax for `FULL-LINE` #82134
    Future
  • Support P/Invokes not going through a pre-stub in Tier 1 #82133
  • vzeroupper fails to be emitted in some P/Invoke scenarios #82132
  • Publish Linux .rpm or .deb #82129
  • Test failures: jitpartialcompilation_pgo #82128
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Loader/classloader/DefaultInterfaceMethods/reabstraction/reabstraction/reabstraction.sh #82127
    8.0.0
  • generation of RID graph no longer works #82125
  • Error while building linux clr on windows #82119
  • Test failure: crossgen2 crash building HardwareIntrinsics tests #82114
  • [GeneratedRegex] Unexpected performance from generated regex. #82113
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-21808: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #82112
  • PS7.3 (using .NET 7) locks up when used with screen on Linux and macOS #82110
  • Mono AOT image size profiling #82101
    Future
  • Cannot install wasm-tools workload from dotnet 7.0 #82099
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_Vector3 #82102
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in Benchstone.BenchI.IniArray #82103
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in ConcurrentDictionary #82105
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #82106
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Tests.Perf_Reader #82107
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Consider adding WriteVoidEndElement and Depth to XmlTextWriter #82091
  • Support marshalled delegates with NativeAOT on iOS platforms #82090
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 23 Regressions on 2/9/2023 12:40:40 PM #82111
  • Tracking issue for CI build failure "agent ran longer than the maximum time of 180 minutes" #82084
    8.0.0
  • varargs and __arglist on different platforms #82081
    Future
  • SupportedLinuxPlatforms_IsSupportedIsTrue fails on distros without quic #82077
    8.0.0
  • ProfileCastClassAndIsInst test failing on NativeAOT #82071
  • Test failure MonoTests.System.Drawing.GraphicsTest.Rotate #82064

Closed

  • Improving the area assignment experience #80296
  • Assertion failed '(emitCurIGfreeBase <= lastInsActualStartAddr) && (lastInsActualStartAddr < emitCurIGfreeEndp)' #81505
    8.0.0
  • issues of milestone 8.0.0 already fixed/present in 7.0.1 #79752
  • [API Proposal]: ignore type discriminator ("$type" properties) in JSON model properties #82012
  • Test failure - many failures in win-x86 GCStress=3 #79516
  • Test failure baseservices\\multidimmarray\\rank1array\\rank1array.cmd #82078
  • Test failure ilasm/PortablePdb/IlasmPortablePdbTests/IlasmPortablePdbTests.sh #57905
    Future
  • [release/6.0] CI Android x86 Mono failure: System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests.NFloatTests #77853
    6.0.x
  • Test failure threading.NamedMutex.test1 #82068
  • [API Proposal]: Add 2 more constructors to ConcurrentDictionary class #77948
    8.0.0
  • Tracking issue for CI build failure "TCP_CONNECTION_FAILED" #82083
    8.0.0
  • `FileSystemEntry.ToSpecifiedFullPath()` returns wrong result when `OriginalRootDirectory` is `X:` #69785
    Future
  • `Directory.EnumerateXXX()` returns wrong paths if the directory is a path like `U:` #82085
  • [6.0] GC_Scenarios. DoublinkList failures in mono minijit linux arm64 #81909
  • [.NET 6]A derived Random class still allocates possibly unnecessary memory #60549
    Future
  • JIT: Missing zero initialization for dependently promoted and returned 16-byte struct #82032
    8.0.0
  • VerifyInstalledTermInfosParse fails for (upcoming) Fedora 38 #82026
  • Is there any static lib for nethost? #81751
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/simple/ParallelCrashMainThread #81363
    8.0.0
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGenerationRollover #82021

PullRequests

Created

  • Proposed host runtime delegate for loading an assembly #82138
    area-Host
  • [SuperFileCheck] Added verification when using 'FULL-LINE-NEXT'. Fixing ARM64 comparison tests. #82135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update CODEOWNERS #82131
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Stop compiling jiterpreter traces when we reach another trace #82130
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [wasi] Add `WasiAppBuilder` task #82126
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Remove reference to Cecil submodule in illink #82124
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/7.0] add RID for Ubuntu 23.04 #82123
    7.0.x
  • Fix NamedMutex PAL test #82122
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [MONO] Implement GC.AddMemoryPressure in Mono #82121
    area-GC-mono
  • [release/6.0] add missing RIDs #82120
    area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #82117
    NO-MERGE, blocked, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix disposing root X.509 certificate prematurely for OCSP stapling #82116
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #82115
    NO-MERGE, blocked, area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm][debugger] Test new chrome version. #82109
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [QUIC] Do not run unconditional Quic test outside our CI #82108
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Include more details in exception from wrong async callback #82104
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • SPMI: Ensure we disable loop alignment consistently #82100
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove ConfigurationBinder usage from Console Logging #82098
    area-Extensions-Logging, size-reduction
  • [browser] do not throw if culture data does not exist in icu #82094
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Intrinsify CreateSpan #82093
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Replace RichNav with Code Index #82088
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update NativeAOT build integration targets to include ios and iossimulator #82086
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] System.Console: allow terminfo files to be larger than 4KiB. #82082
    area-System.Console
  • Considerably speed up building the test tree on Windows #82080
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add test that uses the host's fallback RID #82076
    area-Host
  • Baseline some failing JIT tests #82075
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Bump generic cycle detection cutoff for the test tree #82074
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Replace `dynamic` with static math in a JIT test #82073
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Simplify an error condition in tryrun.cmake #82070
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [workloads] Upstream workload fixes from 7.0 #82069
    area-Workloads

Merged

  • Generalize `emitRemoveLastInstruction()` #82002
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable rundownvalidation test on GCStress for arm #82118
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Use string interpolation in a few more places #82096
    area-Meta
  • Remove allocations in some System.Net GetHashCode methods #82095
    area-System.Net
  • [QUIC] Disable test for arm Ubuntu 18.04 #82092
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Sprinkle some more readonly around #81297
    area-Meta
  • annotation changes only #82072
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Allow ConcurrentDictionary concurrencyLevel == -1 #82067
    area-System.Collections
  • Add Linux NativeAOT debug info regression test #81612
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [6.0] Update WASM Windows helix queue #82097
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Temporarily disable ParallelCrash, ParallelCrashMainThread under GCStress #82066
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add emsdk dependencies to fix codeflow to installer #81988
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Temporarily disable TestCallingConventions test for x86 GCStress #82060
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Revert "Allow some intrinsics in Tier0 (#77357)" #82079
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement XML log fixer for Helix #80751
  • Remove a bunch of array allocations #82041
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Fix XmlSqlBinaryReader and introduce a corpus of SqlXml tests (#81878) #82062
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Xml, 6.0.15
  • [release/7.0] Fix XmlSqlBinaryReader and introduce a corpus of SqlXml tests (#81878) #82063
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Xml, 7.0.4
  • Lazily initialize base state for Random-derived type #81627
  • JIT: Optimize zero inits out only for locals that aren't candidates to be tracked #82042
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add assert messages to ConcurrentDictionary test failing on native aot #82047
    area-System.Collections
  • System.Console: allow terminfo files to be larger than 4KiB. #82038
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • RegularExpressions.Tests: match MicrosoftCodeAnalysisVersion used by RegularExpressions.Generator when DotNetBuildFromSource. #82036
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Templatize fgAddRefPred #81865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix build.cmd -s clr.aot+libs #82019
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Intrinsify `CreateSpan` in static constructor interpreter #81747
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Temporarily disable Interop/COM/ComWrappers/WeakReference/WeakReferenceTest #82054
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Disable DictionaryExpansion.cmd test on win-x86 #82056
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable tests blocked on closed issue #50381 #82024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move 'special characters' detection logic to JsonReaderHelpers.cs #82059
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Use the new BitArray.HasAllSet() method #82057
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add new proposed API to Ancillary.Interop #81063
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Create skeleton for the ComInterfaceGenerator #80887
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] On importing a CEE_INITOBJ for a simd, construct a VecCon(0) #81982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] LclMorph `GT_IND(GT_LCL_VAR_ADDR)` => `GT_CAST(GT_LCL_VAR)` narrow-cast only #81454
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Testmerging JIT/Directed #81969
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2113939 #81871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Slightly refactor handling of conditions/conditional branches in the backend #82020
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup intrinsinsics + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #81006
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Update ILLink wording #82050
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Convert to GeneratedRegexAttribute fixer should preserve references to const string fields #81997
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Add ability to generate library and exe entry points #81873
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] wasi: add workload packs, templates, and Wasi.Build.Tests #81849
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Use cinc instead of csel when possible #82031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable building NativeAOT for Apple mobile platforms #81780
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Adding support to mono for v128 constants #81902
  • [android][ios] Add LibraryBuilder task to support aot library mode #81919
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0] prevent use of null when processing alpn list #81797
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • [WIP] Honor virtual memory limit #80295
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Skip wasm frames if just my code is enabled #81732
    area-Debugger-mono
  • update alpine test images #81841
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Pooled async value task for HTTP 1 connection #81426
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Enable dedup by default for iOS #81319
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Remove System.Security.Permissions from S.C.CM. #80347
    area-System.Configuration, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • CI: don't trigger *all* library tests on wasm-only changes #81906
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Optimize JIT_ClassProfile32 #82014
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] Implement synch block fast paths in managed #81380
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Initial changes for GetLocaleInfoString #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Make `WasmMainJSPath` optional #81484
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [mono][interp] Add instrinsics for common Vector128 operations #81782
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Unify type instantiations in reflection emit #81518
    area-System.Reflection
  • Switch to selfhosted NativeAOT compiler #81205
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range(...).ToArray() #80633
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Disable a couple of coreclr test for unloadability testing #80945
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Code analysis reporting bogus warning messages without a issue number #30592
  • [NETSDKE2E][Regression]With NET8 preview 1 SDK installed, Maui template is missing. #30576

Closed

  • Ability to produce universal macos binaries (x64+arm) #30342
  • `dotnet test` CLI accepts neither SOLUTION nor PROJECT arguments anymore #30368

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #30609
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #30605
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #30604
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.2xx #30601
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30595
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [GenAPI] Synthesize an internal default constructor for the type with implicit default constructor and the base type without. #30594
    Area-GenAPI
  • Bump FluentAssertions from 6.9.0 to 6.10.0 #30581
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable Dependabot for branch release/7.0.3xx #30580
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add some more details on team triage #30574
    Area-NetSDK

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #30599
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add @andriipatsula and @dotnet/area-infrastructure-libraries as codeowners for GenAPI #30607
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Document `Workload Clean` Design #30480
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #30600
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30570
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #30571
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix package cache group SID #30579
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, 8.0.1xx
  • Better fix for the OSX issues in installer repo #30573
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #30598
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #30597
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [GenAPI] generate forwarded type assembly attributes. #30556
    Area-GenAPI
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Port Fix dotnet new -v displaying exception callstack (#30292) #30557
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2113948 #30412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • GenAPI: add workaround for IFieldSymbol.Name that has angle brackets #30572
    Area-GenAPI
  • Add tracking of the nuget cache to see how many files we downloaded during the test run. #29264
    Area-Infrastructure
  • dotnet tool install skip unlisted version #28951

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Using nullable checks and bool methods on an object not generating consistent code #6966

Updated

  • Proposal: Property-Scoped Fields #133
    Backlog
  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    11.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove the C# MSDN forum as it was archived #6969

Merged

  • Capture open question for `this` assignment #6964

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crash in AnalzyerDriver. #66878
    17.6
  • Rename class names but some will not be renamed #66873
  • C# Task List doesn't display items #66872

Closed

  • Difference between IIncrementalGenerator RegisterImplementationSourceOutput vs RegisterSourceOutput #66601
  • Suggestion: Fix broken view auto-scrolling #39505
    Backlog
  • Specifying a parameter on a method as a nullable enum with a default value displays the numeric value instead of the enum value #39502
    Backlog
  • Adding readonly modifier via quick fix deletes preceding blank line #39404
    Backlog
  • microsoft.codeanalysis.buildtasks.unittests.targettests.testimplicitlyskipanalyzers is flaky #66619
  • Refactoring "Compute constant value" not available on constant-only-values. #39142
    Backlog
  • solutioncrawler.workcoordinatortests.additionaldocumentopenedclosedevents is flaky #66658
  • C# and VB operation trees are different for logically the same code #66511
    17.6
  • Compiler reports error CS0618 'member' is obsolete even when the containing member is obsolete itself #66409
  • EnumUnderlyingType is NULL when calling Complation.GetTypeByMetadataName() on any Enum defined in a MetadataReference. #66631
  • Generate method doesn't infer good return type in switch expression. #37825
    Backlog
  • `T` in pattern `obj is not T` or `obj is ... or T` relates to containing type's property `T` instead of type name `T` if `T` is declared as both a property and a type #66841
  • Suboptimal codegen for local async method #66638
  • Which commit corresponds to 4.4.0 (latest) on nuget? #66848
  • Null suppressions that will be fixed by .NET 5 annotations #41539
  • "Introduce using statement" refactoring doesn't show up in the middle of a variable #38540
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33413.323 #66870
  • "Add null check" adds meaningless null check #38093
    Backlog
  • Extend Introduce local for expression statement to handle unbounded LHS of assignment expr. #38482
    Backlog
  • update build error more frequently when build + intellisense error filter is selected like when "Build only" is selected #38428
    Backlog
  • I hope to get option to insert "#nullable enable" when C# source code is created #38387
    Backlog
  • IDE0044 is incorrectly suggested for pointer fields used with address-of operator #38287
    Backlog
  • Expose IsInExpressionTree #38100
    Backlog
  • VS 16.1.6 - Collection Initializer Comment Bug #38065
    17.6 P3
  • Assign properties from different classes but that have similar names and types e.g In constructor #38036
    Backlog
  • intellisense creates a new method after selecting existing method in file and pressing tab #38033
    Backlog
  • Qualifying static member suppresses refactoring suggestions #38031
    Backlog
  • Generated GetHashCode implementation falls foul of BCL nullability of IEqualityComparer<>.GetHashCode #37913
    Backlog
  • VS 16.2.0 - IDE Crash TryConvertSimpleDoubleQuoteString OutOfMemoryException #37721
    Backlog
  • Improve diagnostics when the project is not restored yet #37717
    Backlog
  • Allow user to set opacity for fading in text editor #37682
    Backlog
  • Filtering error list does not update. #37599
    Backlog
  • Recursive Intellisense - similar to search in file manager #37548
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add more using-alias-to-type tests #66889
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix the span of 'introduce parameter' #66887
    Area-IDE
  • WIP - fix workspace pull diagnostics #66886
    Area-IDE
  • Fix enum preselection in switch expressions #66883
    Area-IDE
  • Make F1 work for DirectCast and TryCast #66882
    Area-IDE
  • Clean and rename FeatureOnOffOptions #66881
    Area-IDE
  • Fix SymbolDisplay to use 'Operator' kind when producing the display for an operator symbol #66880
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not suggest to remove discard, if it can lead to a compiler error #66879
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Include nullability informtion in QuickInfo when invoked on 'var' #66877
    Area-IDE
  • Use next sibling in SyntaxNode.GetChildPosition() if available #66876
    Area-Compilers
  • Update 'make local function static' to support capturing 'this' as a parameter to that local funtion. #66875
    Area-IDE
  • Change block structure options to editorconfig-like name #66869
    Area-IDE
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into PrimaryConstructors #66866
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66884
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move the 'remove in keyword' fixer down to shared layer #66856
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66682
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove some outdated configurations in tools #52800
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Move 'conflict resolution' fixer down to shared layer #66855
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Added another F# test project for external access #66874
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Don't include star when committing promoted item #66858
    Area-IDE, Next
  • move the 'make struct a ref struct' fixer down to shared layer #66853
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move the 'replace default literal' fixer down to shared layer #66850
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move the 'upgrade project' fixer down to the shared layer #66849
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve generate-method in switch-exprs #66867
    Area-IDE, Next
  • move the 'remove async modifier' fixer down to shared layer #66852
    Area-IDE, Next
  • move 'remove unused local function' down to shared layer #66851
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unnecessary null suppressions in calls to `RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode` #66842
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix issue where we were adding a parameter null check after it was of any use #66868
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove expensive call to ApplyPolicy #66845
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Move 'use explicit type for constants' down to anlayzer layer #66847
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Local state tracing instrumentation #66768
    Area-Compilers
  • Push on Restore bug #66864
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move the 'remove new modifier' fixer down to shared layer #66857
    Area-IDE
  • Fix parsing of 'file[]' and 'required[]' in old language versions #66769
    Area-Compilers
  • Track state table removal due to input separately from removal due to selection #66643
    Area-Compilers
  • Move the 'make method async' fixer down to shared layer #66863
    Area-IDE
  • Move the 'make method synchronous' fixer down to shared layer #66862
    Area-IDE
  • Move 'doc comment' related code fixers down to shared layer #66860
    Area-IDE
  • Move 'convert to record' fixer down to shared layer #66859
    Area-IDE
  • Address PROTOTYPE comments for "Primary Constructors" #66865
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Provide unique suggestions when generating member names #66824
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • blazor wasm duplicated requests when using individual account auth #46658

Created

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Long running GeoLocation #13335
  • App crash on iOS when using SQLite-net-pcl #13334
  • Cannot start clean .Net Maui project in Visual Studio for Mac #13331
  • Google Analytics implementation #13330
  • Google Ads implementation #13329
  • [Android] Throws runtime error in `mscorlib`, expected class `System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ValueTaskAwaiter1` #13328
  • CarouselView on Android does not work if HorizontalTextAlignment in Entry is not Start #13323
    Backlog
  • Button in Maui Transparent #13317
  • Grid rows overlap when a cell content is wrapped #13315
    Backlog
  • (Even empty app, not with other regular desktop browsers) MAUI.Blazor, with rapid (keyboard + mouse) input between multiple div element with contenteditable set to true, becomes unresponsive to mouse / touch #13314
  • UriImageSource and dependencies #13309
    Backlog

Closed

  • iOS Binding Library - Cannot find types declared #13283
  • publish failed with PublishSingleFile=true #13290
  • Publish to Windows Storage #13324
  • WebView Crashes when `Source.Html` is updated more than once on Windows #10438
    Backlog
  • Setting a Label of TextType HTML with encoded HTML causes crash. #13319
  • [Bug] Obsolete some of the AutomationProperties? #2888
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Maui Community pop up doesn't work in OnAppearing() #13305
  • .NET Maui application throws System.DllNotFoundException for libMicrosoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.core.so #7792
  • CollectionView: SelectedItem does not get highlighted (dotNet 6.0.400-preview.22330.6) #8863
  • failed to prepare device for development. xcode 14.2, iOS 16.2 - Physical device #12286

PullRequests

Created

  • Have Frame use MinimumHeight/Width for minimums instead of constraints #13336
  • [core] WeakEventManager.RemoveEventHandler() should clear subscriptions #13333
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Add shell pages via controller instead of handler #13332
  • [core] fix memory leaks in bindings #13327
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [Windows] Fixed dupe items in ShellView #13326
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • [Android & iOS] Fix focus issues with DatePicker and TimePicker #13321
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Finalize Essentials API Docs #13320
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android & iOS] Use the correct colors by themes with Alerts on Android and iOS #13318
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/theme

Merged

  • [Windows] Fix crash on Windows WebView updating the Html Source more than once #13222
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Resizetizer] Do not update images if they have not been updated. #13224
    area/single project ☝️
  • Obsolete some of the AutomationProperties #13104
    area/a11y
  • [controls] fix memory leak in Style and AttachedCollection #13260
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Update Essentials API Docs Misc #12996
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [controls] one less WeakReference in TypedBinding #13304
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13306
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • reduce duplicate IndexOf calls #12599
    community ✨
  • [macOS] Fix crash using Shell SearchHandler on Catalyst #11926
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/shell 🐢
  • Fix setting bottom tab icon title #12889
    area/shell 🐢
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Fix sizing of button when using CharacterSpacing #13250
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Android] Fix clipped text in SwipeItem under some DPIs #11931
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Disable caching when loading images from streams #13111
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • [Android] Don't lose the padding when background is set #13301
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [MacOS/iOS] Fixed incorrect color of RadioButton in Dark Mode using Default Control Template. #13215

  • CollectionView - Recycle DataTemplates when using template selector #12011

  • Handle renamed or deleted MauiImage files #13251
    area/single project ☝️
  • [All platforms] Notify changes in CollectionView Layouts #13137

  • Set Icon to null and back again, working around Android issue #13267
    platform/android 🤖
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Ensure OnMeasure always calls SetMeasuredDimension in ShellPageContainer #13153

  • Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus #12890

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use shape of documents in the Cosmos database to scaffold a schema #30290
  • Issues with get only collections in EF7 #30286
  • EFCore 7 - Aggregate types - Update JSON column without using any JSON function #30283
  • Generate migration per model change #30282
  • When I update multiple entities whose navigation properties are the same object, only one of the entities is successfully updated #30281
  • i changed scaffold-dbcontext template for class name its work but i cant change filename #30284
  • Howto use Entity splitting to map some properties to main SQLite database and other properties to attached SQLite database #30279
  • Query: missing parens for complex query with Not and Negate #30277
  • EFCore 7 - Aggregate types- Inserting custom value for boolean key in JSON column #30276

Closed

  • Count after Take throws "No column name was specified for column 1 of 't'." #29667
    7.0.4
  • Non-empty second migration in TPC scheme using inheritance #30058
    7.0.4
  • Replace multi-level relationship in Entity Framework Core 6 vs 7 #30135
    7.0.4
  • .NET 7 regression: Deletion can cause error "The association between entity types A and B has been severed etc." #30122
    7.0.4
  • Entity Framework Core 7 keeps creating the same migration for Nullable DateTime field #29985
    7.0.4
  • Nested Entities coming as null on reading using EF core 6 with Azure Cosmos DB #30055
  • Moving properties of an entity to Owned ValueObject doesn't change the table column names? #30278
  • Test: Tpc_entity_owning_a_split_collection_on_middle takes forever to run #30265
  • Query: Null semantics doesn't convert LIKE to 2-value logic when optimized expansion is not allowed #30262

PullRequests

Created

  • SqlServer: Support hierarchyid #30291
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #30289
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #30288
  • Adding procedural test generation to test interactions between various operators. #30280

Merged

  • Simplify SqlExpressionSimplifyingExpressionVisitor #30252
    auto-merge
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #30287
  • [release/7.0] Store null table name in the model snapshot for TPC abstract types #30275
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] Use default schema for TPC tables (#30214) #30241
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Prevent re-entrance into DetectChanges #30240
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Use correct provider type for nullable value type with converter #30219
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.4
